<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1344773_stitch_requested</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_1344773_stitch_requested">group_assignedVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="group_assigned" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Adding group members</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var groupMembers = new GroupMembers();
var users = groupMembers.getUsersByGroup('Stitch Engineers');
gs.info('Users in Stitch Engineers: ' + users);

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-02 12:34:19</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7b167b0f931012101f72f1ccebba10b5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Adding group members</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Stitch" source="x_1344773_stitch">888cb566931012101f72f1ccebba10f4</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Stitch">888cb566931012101f72f1ccebba10f4</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_7b167b0f931012101f72f1ccebba10b5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-02 12:34:19</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=7b167b0f931012101f72f1ccebba10b5"/></record_update>
